channel.title: Hosting legit dice games
channel.description:
Join my clan chat: CLU
Roll above 60 and win X2 and Dice Duels.
Join CC and see world.
[[[[currently off]]]]
200k min

two six sided dice. who ever rolls higher wins.

what are dice duels?
[/quote]
Basically was dragon dyce does.

Two people bet, I’ll take a small 10% commission if it’s actually worth taking. If it’s like 100k each I don’t really want that little amount.[/quote]
they bet on what? whether the result of the roll will be over or under/equal to 50?

item.title: Hosting legit dice games
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

reyx7:

Turned 100k in 450k then into 5k.

you need a limit if you double your money make sure to only bet half if you lose it leave. you will always leave with a profit this way. of course if you lose on your first bet you go into the hole and its difficult to get out.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting legit dice games
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:52, topic:388528”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=484349.msg3554351#msg3554351 date=1301774126]

yeah you both roll highest roll wins go watch a few round world 2 “dragon dyce” cc its fun to see the ones betting 100m lose then cry. I usually go in with 1 or 2m as most of the time people bet anywhere between 100k and 5m today I walked away with 35m+ usually i double and leave.

Sounds like you win EVERY time?
[/quote]
no but i bet smart usually i bet high my first time if i lose i double my original bet, if i win i start betting lower until i lose again. yes you can go into a losing rut and start losing 3 4 games in a row but i find it uncommon.[/quote]
That seems like a nice game… i might try this out.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting legit dice games
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:50, topic:388528”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=484349.msg3554325#msg3554325 date=1301772641]
yeah you both roll highest roll wins go watch a few round world 2 “dragon dyce” cc its fun to see the ones betting 100m lose then cry. I usually go in with 1 or 2m as most of the time people bet anywhere between 100k and 5m today I walked away with 35m+ usually i double and leave.
[/quote]

Sounds like you win EVERY time?[/quote]
no but i bet smart usually i bet high my first time if i lose i double my original bet, if i win i start betting lower until i lose again. yes you can go into a losing rut and start losing 3 4 games in a row but i find it uncommon.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting legit dice games
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

ok lets say I bet you 5m we each give 5m to the “trusted host” they make sure both parties pay have dice know the rules ect. then we both roll our two 6 sided dice in clan chat. highest number wins tie = reroll. winner would get 9m

Highest number wins tie = reroll? /Confused
Do you mean highest number roller wins?

Read full topic
